attributes.name: data-tchmi-data
attributes.description:
Data to show in the object browser (format is defined in the Columns attribute). You also need to define the schema of the data in the 'DataSchema' attribute. 
This attribute is not used if a DataSymbol is configured.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-data-schema
attributes.description:
The schema of the data. 
This attribute is not used if a DataSymbol is configured.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-data-symbol
attributes.description: A Symbol of type tchmi:general#/definitions/Any which contains the data to be displayed in the object browser. This attribute overwrites an existing Data and DataSchema attribute.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-columns
attributes.description: Description of the columns and the format of the data

attributes.name: data-tchmi-indirect-write
attributes.description: If set to true, all inputs made by the user will not be written to the data until the 'writePreparedValues' function is called.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-sorting
attributes.description: Can be used to sort the data. If used in combination with DataSymbol, the data will be sorted on the server.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-filter
attributes.description: Can be used to filter the data. If used in combination with DataSymbol, the data will be filtered on the server.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-ignore-first-level
attributes.description: Defines if the first level is displayed or not.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-first-level-name
attributes.description: The name of the top level element. Only applied when the 'Data' and 'DataSchema' attributes are used.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-row-classes-provider

requiredArguments.description: The row value to use to determine the classes for the row.
The hierarchical index of the row data in the data.
The hierarchical index. This may differ from the data index if the table is sorted.

attributes.description: Specifies a function that takes row data as an argument and returns an array of strings to be used as CSS classes on the row.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-header-height
attributes.description: Height of the table header cells.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-header-height-unit
attributes.description: Could be 'px' or for relative positioning '%'.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-header-cell-padding
attributes.description: The distance of the header to the border.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-header-font-family
attributes.description: Comma separated list of family name or keyword: 'serif', 'sans-serif', 'monospace'.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-header-font-size
attributes.description: The size of the font. Percent values are relative to the parent elements font size.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-header-font-size-unit
attributes.description: Could be 'px' or for relative sizing '%'.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-header-font-style
attributes.description: 'Normal', 'Italic' (slanted with special glyphs), 'Oblique' (slanted normal glyphs) or 'Auto' for inherited.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-header-font-weight
attributes.description: 'Normal', 'Bold' (glyphs with more weight) or 'Auto' for inherited.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-row-height
attributes.description: Height of a row.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-cell-content-padding
attributes.description: The distance of the cell content to the border.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-grid-font-family
attributes.description: Comma separated list of family name or keyword: 'serif', 'sans-serif', 'monospace'.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-grid-font-size
attributes.description: The size of the font. Percent values are relative to the parent elements font size.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-grid-font-size-unit
attributes.description: Could be 'px' or for relative sizing '%'.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-grid-font-style
attributes.description: 'Normal', 'Italic' (slanted with special glyphs), 'Oblique' (slanted normal glyphs) or 'Auto' for inherited.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-grid-font-weight
attributes.description: 'Normal', 'Bold' (glyphs with more weight) or 'Auto' for inherited.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-show-header
attributes.description: Defines whether the header is displayed or not.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-show-row-numbers
attributes.description: Defines whether the row numbers are displayed or not.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-row-numbers-resizable
attributes.description: Defines whether the row numbers are resizable or not.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-row-numbers-start-number
attributes.description: The starting number of the row numbers.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-row-numbers-width
attributes.description: Width of the Row Number Column

attributes.name: data-tchmi-row-numbers-width-unit
attributes.description: Could be 'px' or for relative positioning '%'.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-row-numbers-horizontal-alignment
attributes.description: Defines the horizontal alignment of the row numbers.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-row-numbers-vertical-alignment
attributes.description: Defines the vertical alignment of the row numbers.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-row-numbers-cell-padding
attributes.description: The distance of the numbers column to the border.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-row-numbers-font-family
attributes.description: Comma separated list of family name or keyword: 'serif', 'sans-serif', 'monospace'.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-row-numbers-font-size
attributes.description: The size of the font. Percent values are relative to the parent elements font size.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-row-numbers-font-size-unit
attributes.description: Could be 'px' or for relative sizing '%'.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-row-numbers-font-style
attributes.description: 'Normal', 'Italic' (slanted with special glyphs), 'Oblique' (slanted normal glyphs) or 'Auto' for inherited.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-row-numbers-font-weight
attributes.description: 'Normal', 'Bold' (glyphs with more weight) or 'Auto' for inherited.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-table-border-width
attributes.description: The width of the table border

attributes.name: data-tchmi-table-border-style
attributes.description: The style of the table border

attributes.name: data-tchmi-header-background-color
attributes.description: The background color of the header

attributes.name: data-tchmi-header-text-color
attributes.description: The text color of the header

attributes.name: data-tchmi-row-numbers-background-color
attributes.description: The background color of the row numbers column

attributes.name: data-tchmi-row-numbers-text-color
attributes.description: The text color of the row numbers column

attributes.name: data-tchmi-table-border-color
attributes.description: The color of the table border

attributes.name: data-tchmi-data-has-changed
attributes.description: The DataHasChanged property show if the user changed data.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-selected-row-value
attributes.description: The data of the selected row.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-selected-cell-value
attributes.description: The value of the selected cell.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-selected-path
attributes.description: The selected row by its symbol name.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-selected-colum
attributes.description: The selected column by its Name.

attributeCategories.name: Data
attributeCategories.description: Attributes defining the data the control is showing.

attributeCategories.name: Grid
attributeCategories.description: Attributes defining the grid layout of the control.

attributeCategories.name: Header
attributeCategories.description: Attributes defining the header of the control.

attributeCategories.name: Row Numbers
attributeCategories.description: Attributes defining the generated row numbers of the control.

functions.name: selectParentRow
functions.description: A function to selected the parent element of the currently selected element.

functions.name: collapseAll
functions.description: A function to callapse every expanded element.

functions.name: expandElement
functions.description: Expand an element by its hierarchical index.

params.name: path
params.description: The path of the element to expand

params.name: expandParents
params.description: Defines whether the parent elements of the selected element will be expanded too.

functions.name: collapseElement
functions.description: Collapse an element by its hierarchical index.

params.name: path
params.description: The path of the element to collapse

functions.name: scrollTo
functions.description: Scroll to an element by its hierarchical index.

params.name: path
params.description: The path of the element to scroll to.

params.name: expandParents
params.description: Defines whether the parent elements of the selected element will be expanded.

functions.name: writePreparedValues
functions.description: Write all changes made by the user to the data. Has no effect if 'IndirectInput' is false.

functions.name: resetPreparedValues
functions.description: Reset all changes made by the user. Has no effect if 'IndirectInput' is false.

events.name: .onDataChanged
events.description: The .onDataChanged event is fired when the user changes the data.

events.name: .onSelectedItemChanged
events.description: The .onSelectedItemChanged event is fired when the selected item changes.

events.name: .onElementExpanded
events.description: The .onElementExpanded event is fired when an element expands.

events.name: .onElementCollapsed
events.description: The .onElementCollapsed event is fired when an element collapses.
